dmca.title: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Ivan [mailto:mail@vano.com.ru] 
Sent: Sunday, September 04, 2005 4:38 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Violation

Hello,

I have found several web sites hosted by Theplanet.com that have stolen the
web design and content from my site.

This is a clear Copyright Violation and I am not going to let it go this
way.

I have already sent several emails to copyright@theplanet.com during the
past month, but have never got any reply from them.

So would you advice please, who I shall contact at Theplanet.com to get a
reply regarding this issue and to get this issue resolved?


Thanks for your time.


Best regards,
 
-Ivan Iargomski              mailto:mail@vano.com.ru
